text:
Good selection of drinks and very cheap! The drinks cost only half as much as at 7 Eleven, for example. Also a very friendly salesperson. And long opening hours.
We would love to come back.

Well stocked convenience store located conveniently along Beach Road, opposite Park Royal Hotel. Drinks, hot beverages, instant noodle, beer, liquor and travel goods. Well priced, cheaper than most 7-11 and even supermarket.
One of the few U marts.. convenience store similar to 7-11 stores

Very reasonable prices while in Singapore I have brought some of the same drinks from similar stores including 7/11 and they where double the price. Good selection of alcoholic and non alcoholic drinks, lollies, toiletries and household supplies you might need In a rush.
Open 24 hours.  Way better than 7-eleven…smells clean inside…well organized
